General.Name: Maman- Cargo Terminals & Handling Ltd
General.Description: Maman- Cargo Terminals & Handling Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides a range of cargo handling services for various international air cargo imported or exported from Israel. It operates a cargo terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport. The company also offers logistics services, such as storage services, inventory management, transportation, and distribution services. Its services include import, export, and courier services; groundside services in the field of commercial freight; and temperature control storage services. The company offers its services to airlines and air courier flights operating at Ben Gurion International Airport. In addition, it engages in the real estate rental business. The company was incorporated in 1974 and is based in Lod, Israel. Maman-Cargo Terminals & Handling Ltd is a subsidiary of Taavura Holdings Ltd.

3.Name: Ms. Irit  Philipovich
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Laufer Aviation GHI
